response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the brisket out of the fridge. The brisket is now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to cook the brisket.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the brisket out of the fridge
(3) Cook the brisket
(4) Put the cooked brisket on the chopping board
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Cook the brisket
    brisket = registry(env,"brisket_189")
    cook(robot, brisket)
    donothing(env)
